body:
Comment 4: 
Do you have root user enabled on your system? The issue happens when you are logged in
as root (not just an admin-rights user) via GUI and then work from a terminal, or via
ssh with 0 as effective UID. Instructions to enable/disable root user are here:

http://support.apple.com/kb/PH11331

On the other hand, I will have a clean slate system on Wednesday, June 5th and will try
it there, to make sure there is no interference with something installed on the current
system.
